page.title: 12Employment In Wash Common
page.content: We surveyed the parents of our class and found that most mothers and fathers worked in an office.A few work in a factory or the micro chip industry. Three work in a library , two in a bank, two in a shop, one in a hospital. We also surveyed 160 parents and discovered half work in Newbury , 10% in London and Reading, 5% in Thatcham and 5% in Aldermaston. The rest travel to towns and villages in about a 20 mile radius of Newbury. We looked at this week's local paper and found 165 job vacancies. The majority were in offices,9 in factories and 7 in shops. The rest were in a wide range of jobs.Unemployment in the Newbury area which includes Wash Common is 8%.
